reviews.review: An old but wonderful game . I highly recommend it ...

It's a classic game, the graphics were outstanding for when it came out and is not unpleasant to look at even now. The story is intriguing and the gun play is fun. As Half-Life 2 was created to be a showcase for a new engine the physics element is put to use for puzzles and combat in excellent fashion. If you haven't already played this game I wholeheartedly suggest you do as soon as possible.

A Classic!
Holds it age with story telling!

Einfach ein geniales und atemberaubendes Spiel, auch nach all den Jahren, die das Spiel bereits auf dem Buckel hat, fesselt es einem immer noch Stundenlang an den PC. Leider muss ich gestehen, dass ich es erst jetzt zum ersten Mal gespielt habe, war aber bereits damals von Half Life 1 angetan und hab es mindestens dreimal durchgespielt.
Absolute Empfehlung auch für Leute, die mit Shooter nichts anfangen können oder solche Art von Spielen das erste Mal spielen, es macht einfach Spaß die Spielwelt zu erkunden. Natürlich ist die Grafik heute nicht mehr am Zahn der Zeit, trotzdem erwarten einem viele viele Stunden Spielspaß!

Grab your trusty crowbar, your infinite pistol and your brightly revealing EXO-Suit as you smash your way through hordes of hostaged zombies and alien freaks who would do anything to make you in scrumptious dinner.

for the people who say it still holds up today.... take off your rose tinted glasses my god, the game may as well be on rails its so linear, only giving you scraps of adventure by placing ammo/health the opposite direction of the objective, oh and there so impressed with there janky physics engine they put barricades EVERYWHERE, its level design is terrible its completely counter intuitive or maybe its the graphics either way you will struggle at times trying to figure out the right direction to go.

listen i understand 2004 was a very different time and it may have been enjoyable then, but IT DOES NOT HOLD UP TODAY stop lying.

Half-life 2 to gra która mi się bardzo podoba. Nie będę spoilerował fabuły ale jest zajebista. Jest to kontynuacja half-life gdzie pod koniec musieliśmy zacząć współpracę z g-man'em. Były tam dwie drogi, czyli dobra i zła.
Half-Life 2 rozpoczyna kontynuację nie złego lecz dobrego zakończenia, gdzie mamy za zadanie uratować miasto pod nazwą "CITY 17" lub jak kto woli "Miasto 17". Half-Life 2 to shooter z dużą dawką akcji.
Bardzo polecam zagrać i wydać te rąbane 36 zł.

must have

Played it in 2007 on a woefully underpowered PC, 2008 on my Xbox 360 in the Orange Box release, and now 2020 with a Steam controller. It was great each time, and with each subsequent playthrough I came out only appreciating it even more. Next time either in VR or MMOD with a texture upgrade. If you're thinking about buying this, get the valve complete pack and don't look back.

I've known this game for a while - I still have the original Half-Life for Playstation 2, and I used to have Half-Life 2 for Xbox but it kept crashing. So I'm glad this is available via Steam. At any rate, it's a top rate adventure/puzzle game with very good graphics.

Half-Life 2 was the first game I played on Steam. I decided to try it out when I bought the Orange Box some month ago and damn, it was a great experience. Half-Life 2 has a good story, memorable characters, awesome gameplay and physics, and Ravenholm (I never want to go there again, but it was fun). It holds up pretty good for today's standard. Even if the graphics is kinda outdated. But it's not the game's fault, it was released 2004.

My only issues with this game is that the vehicle sections is too long and the AI is pretty predictable sometimes. But besides that, Half-Life 2 is a unique experience that you should absolutely try out once in your life. I will definitely play this again some day.

9.5 out of 10.

What a classic. Tense gameplay that helped shape the FPS genre as we know it today with a sci-fi story that's original and ahead of its time even after 16 years. Absolute must-play for anybody with an interest in games.

Hardware: i7-7700HQ, 32GB RAM, GeForce GTX 1070
OS: Windows 10

>Pros:
+Great, tight level design
+Varied, polished gameplay mechanics introduced consistently throughout the game
+Great pacing
+Great arsenal of weapons each with its unique flavour
+Incredible atmosphere
+Facial animations are still impressive

>Cons:
-Human enemy AI can be very poor sometimes
-Some textures have not aged well at all
-Frequent loading

This game still holds up. Yes at some points it still shows its age, but the tight pacing, level design and atmosphere are jut as engrossing as they were back then. Everyone should play this game.
